title: Metal Logos - found via Daily Design
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130704053409im_/http:/typophile.com/files/deathmetal_4325.jpg)

[Daily Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20130704053409/http:/dailydesign.livejournal.com/) is a design blog I've been checking out since my first year of graphic design. They post some amazing things, ranging from graphic design to even product design. Definitely an awesome site to check out.
author: dragoncaller

comments.content:
i guess legibility is a dirty word in the world of metal.  
gr8 site!!
